assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Okura Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells polyethylene and polypropylene products in Japan. It offers automotive films, drum interior films, adhesives for metal parts, tray food films, meat packaging films, shrink films for food packaging, liquid filling films, laminated films for food, commercial transport films, packaging films, mail order films, logistics films, liquid transport films, functional garbage bags, flexographic printing related films, laminate-related films, environmentally friendly products, base films for packaging, polarizing plate protection films/ retardation films, self-adhesive protective films, optical films, OA equipment parts, parts adhesives, and 5G communication antenna substrate materials. The company also provides curing films, architectural films, films for laminating steel plates, films for integrated packaging, particle boards, soil insulation films, soil temperature rise control films, pest repellent films, color scheme films, antibacterial agricultural films, biodegradable films, stretch films for grass, liquid fertilizer filling films, environment friendly films, films of tunnels, sanitary materials and daily necessities films, clean films, dressing films, infection control and inspection supplies, thermoplastic polyurethane elastomer films, embossed films, and endo barriers. It serves automobile, food, medical/pharmaceutical, general packaging, optics/information electronics, architecture, agriculture, and livingware industries. The company was formerly known as Shikoku Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Okura Industrial Co., Ltd. in November 1955. Okura Industrial Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Marugame, Japan.
